components.name: In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
components.description: The ability to discover, install, and manage apps inside of Atlassian's Cloud products (Jira, Confluence, Stride, Bitbucket)

components.name: In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)
components.description: The ability to discover, install, and manage apps inside of Atlassian's Server products (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, Bamboo, Fisheye / Crucible, Hipchat)

components.name: aui-cdn.atlassian.com
components.description: The Atlassian User Interface (AUI) CDN

components.name: Notifications
components.description: Example notifications include newly posted reviews and new version creation

components.name: Forge App Logs
components.description: Access and retrieve app logs via Forge CLI and admin.atlassian.com

components.name: Forge App Monitoring
components.description: View Forge app metrics via developer console

components.name: Reporting APIs and dashboards
components.description: Marketing attribution reports are now operational.

components.name: Developer console
components.description: Reliability of https://developer.atlassian.com/console

components.name: Forge direct app distribution
components.description: A way to share your apps with a set of trusted site admins: https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/forge/distribute-your-apps/#start-sharing-your-app

components.name: Hosted storage
components.description: Atlassian hosted storage for hosted and remote compute.

components.name: End-user consent
components.description: Prompt for consent of specific permissions for an app.

components.name: Forge App Alerts
components.description: Receive email alerts when Forge app breaches SLI and view alert details via dev console.

components.name: Forge SQL
components.description: SQL capability that powers the control plane and data plane operations for Forge SQL

incident_updates.body: Update - We understand the impact this issue is having on your operations and want to assure you that resolving this matter is our highest priority. Our public cloud provider is actively working to mitigate this issue with urgency.  While we do not have a definitive ETA at this time, we remain committed to full resolution and deeply appreciate your patience as we work through this situation.  We will continue to provide updates every hour or sooner as new information becomes available.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body: Update - We understand the impact this issue is having on your operations and want to assure you that resolving this matter is our highest priority. Our public cloud provider is actively working to mitigate this issue with urgency.  While we do not have a definitive ETA at this time, we remain committed to full resolution and deeply appreciate your patience as we work through this situation.  We will continue to provide updates every hour or sooner as new information becomes available.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body: We understand your pain and mitigating or fixing this issue is of utmost importance. Our public cloud provider is actively working to mitigate this issue on priority. We have been seeing partial operational success. We appreciate your patience and will continue to provide updates every hour or sooner.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body: Our public cloud provider is working to mitigate this issue quickly. We are seeing some early positive indicators and are continuing to monitor. We appreciate your patience and will continue to provide updates every hour or sooner.

incident_updates.body: Atlassian team is actively engaged and continues to work with our public cloud provider to mitigate this issue at the earliest. We are starting to see partial operations succeed. We appreciate your patience. We shall continue to share updates every hour, if not sooner.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body: We continue to work with our public cloud provider towards mitigating the issue at the earliest. We appreciate your patience. We shall continue to share updates every hour, if not sooner.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body:
We understand that our public cloud provider has identified the cause of the issue. We are starting to see some recovery and is working towards mitigation. We appreciate your patience.
We shall continue to share updates every hour, if not sooner.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body:
We are experiencing an outage due to some issue at the end of our public cloud provider. We are working closely with them to get this resolved or mitigated as quickly as possible. ETA of the same is not know at the moment.
We shall continue to share updates every hour, if not sooner.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body:
We are experiencing an outage due to some issue at the end of our public cloud provider. We are working closely with them to get this resolved or mitigated as quickly as possible. ETA of the same is not know at the moment.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body:
Atlassian Cloud services are impacted and we are aware that our customers might not be able to create support tickets. Our teams are actively investigating the same.
We shall keep you informed of the progress every hour.

affected_components.name: Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Cloud)
Marketplace - In-product Marketplace and app installation (Server)

incident_updates.body:
We have noticed that Atlassian Cloud services are impacted and our teams are actively investigating the same.
We shall keep you informed of the progress every hour.
